sources.title: Fright (1956) PSYCHO THRILLER
sources.description:
Director: W. Lee Wilder
Stars: Nancy Malone, Eric Fleming, Frank Marth 

A woman believes she is the reincarnated spirit of an ancient prince's lover. Meanwhile, a murderer turns out to be the reincarnated spirit of the prince himself!

metadata.Plot: A woman believes herself to be the reincarnated spirit of an ancient prince's lover. Meanwhile, a murderer turns out to be the reincarnated spirit of the prince himself.
metadata.Actors: Eric Fleming, Nancy Malone, Frank Marth
